description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Brugge, Belgium. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Brugge Hotel Built on Heritage Cathedral Ruins near Market Square
hotels.description: In a timeless medieval city of canals and cobblestone streets, Crowne Plaza Brugge, an IHG Hotel is a refined retreat offering modern comfort and service just five minutes from the bustling Market Square. Enjoy outstanding locally-sourced dishes at the PlazaCafe restaurant, refresh and renew yourself at the indoor pool and fitness centre or take a trip through time as you gaze upon the heritage ruins of Saint Donatian's cathedral, located in the basement of the hotel.

seo.title: Hotel a Brugge - Belgium Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Brugge, Belgium con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
